```
    # cd /usr/local/etc
     # cp ddclient.conf.sample ddclient.conf
     # ee ddclient.conf
    ```

```
    ##
    ## dyndns.org custom addresses
    ##
    ## (supports variables: wildcard,mx,backupmx)
    ##
    custom=yes,                           \
    server=members.dyndns.org,            \
    protocol=dyndns2                      \
    login=username                        \
    password=password                     \
    example.com
    ```

```
    # ps -ax | grep ddclient

    p0  S      0:00.05 ddclient - sleeping for 300 seconds (perl)
    ```
